name: Blazing Laurel
desc:
A violent W-Engine that can ignite flames with a siphon. It deals simple and crude burn damage, encouraging relentless, bone-crushing follow-up attacks. Rumor has it that the liquid fluid within was once a secret weapon from an old civilization's empire that dominated naval warfare! The formula has long since been lost and recreating it is extremely difficult!

<ct color=#959595>"...Actually, all I said was that I wanted a backup lighter." â€”Lighter says as the user of this valuable fuel</ct>
desc2: Equip to increase Stun Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: A violent W-Engine that can ignite flames with a siphon. It deals simple and crude burn damage, encouraging relentless, bone-crushing follow-up attacks.
phaseDescs: Upon launching a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Assist</ct>, the equipper's Impact increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>25%</ct> for 8s. When the equipper launches and hits an enemy with a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, apply <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wilt</ct> to the target for 30s, stacking up to 20 times, repeated triggers reset the duration. When any squad member hits an enemy, for every stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Wilt</ct> applied to the target, the CRIT DMG of the <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct> and <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> dealt by that attack increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>1.5%</ct>. Only one of this effect can be active at a time in the same squad.

Upon launching a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Assist</ct>, the equipper's Impact increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>28.75%</ct> for 8s.
